name: Clashing Candies
description: This is a 2D fighting game. It's about candies fighting against each other to end the whole debate about which candy is the best. you choose your favorite candy and start the fight. The game will be updated monthly and pretty soon I'll be uploading the game on steam and consoles if people show their love. Hurry up and download the game because I'll be charging people to download the game! Don't be afraid to comment on any bugs or anything in the comment section.
